name: BalanceScanner
description: An Ether or token balance scanner.

functionDecorators.name: etherBalances
functionDecorators.description: Get the Ether balance for all addresses specified.

parameterDecorators.name: addresses
parameterDecorators.description: The addresses to get the Ether balance for.

returnDecorators.name: balances
returnDecorators.description: The Ether balance for all addresses in the same order as specified.

functionDecorators.name: tokenBalances
functionDecorators.description: Get the ERC-20 token balance of `token` for all addresses specified. This does not check if the `token` address specified is actually an ERC-20 token.

parameterDecorators.name: addresses
parameterDecorators.description: The addresses to get the token balance for.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the ERC-20 token contract.

returnDecorators.name: balances
returnDecorators.description: The token balance for all addresses in the same order as specified.

functionDecorators.name: tokensBalance
functionDecorators.description: Get the ERC-20 token balance from multiple contracts for a single owner.

parameterDecorators.name: owner
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token owner.

parameterDecorators.name: contracts
parameterDecorators.description: The addresses of the ERC-20 token contracts.

returnDecorators.name: balances
returnDecorators.description: The token balances in the same order as the addresses specified.

functionDecorators.name: tokensBalances
functionDecorators.description: Get the ERC-20 token balances for multiple contracts, for multiple addresses. This does not check if the `token` address specified is actually an ERC-20 token.

parameterDecorators.name: addresses
parameterDecorators.description: The addresses to get the token balances for.

parameterDecorators.name: contracts
parameterDecorators.description: The addresses of the ERC-20 token contracts.

returnDecorators.name: balances
returnDecorators.description: The token balances in the same order as the addresses specified.
